seo.title: Pricing - ReplyStack | AI Review Response Plans
seo.description: Choose your ReplyStack plan. From free to business - AI-powered review responses for every business size. Start with 15 free replies/month.

title: Simple, transparent pricing
subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs. All plans include a 7-day free trial.

allFeaturesBanner.badge: All features included on every plan

customPrompts.title: Custom Prompts
customPrompts.description: Personalize your AI responses with custom instructions

responseProfile.title: Response Profile
responseProfile.description: Configure your business style once, reply instantly

cancel.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.

quota.question: What happens when I run out of replies?
quota.answer: Your quota resets at the beginning of each month. If you need more replies, you can upgrade to a higher plan at any time.

refund.question: Do you offer refunds?
refund.answer: We offer a 7-day free trial on all paid plans. If you're not satisfied within the first 30 days, contact us for a full refund.

switch.question: Can I switch plans?
switch.answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan at any time. The difference will be prorated. Downgrades take effect at the next billing cycle.

support.text: Have questions? We're here to help.
